reg_pit.acttitle: Credit Union Incorporation Act and Business Corporations Act
reg_pit.title: Credit Union Incorporation Act Regulation

change.changenote: Section 0.1 was enacted by BC Reg 32/2022, effective February 17, 2022.
Section 1 was renumbered as section 1 (2) by BC Reg 32/2022, effective February 17, 2022.
Section 1 (1) and (3) to (6) were added by BC Reg 32/2022, effective February 17, 2022.
Section 1 (2) (part) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 32/2022, effective February 17, 2022.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 14.1 (4) of the Credit Union Incorporation Act, a name must not resemble

change.changenote: Section 1.1 was enacted by BC Reg 32/2022, effective February 17, 2022.
